description:
Welcome to Escape Game:20 Doors Escape - a adventure games!

Do you think you have the skills with Escape Game:20 Doors Escape - a adventure games?


'Wow! This Game Is Just Amazing! Excitement All The Way!'
'This Free Game Exceeded My Expectations! Download Now!'
'Downright Fun! My Kid Can't Stop Playing It!'
'I Love It When I Reach The Bottom And Catch The Bag Of Gold!'


Escape Game:20 Doors Escape - a adventure games a point and click escape game. Are you good at unlocking doors with your puzzle solving skills? Here are 20 doors for you to unlock in this escape game. Are you ready for 20 doors unlocking challenge? Go ahead and unlock all the doors if you can. Have fun!

Game features:

Genuine story!
Innovative puzzles!
Stunning graphics!
Realistic atmosphere!
